articles.author: Joshua Shavit
articles.title: Creature hiding in California lake reveals evolutionary secrets from 650 million years ago - The Brighter Side of News
articles.description: Researchers have identified a microscopic organism in this extreme environment of Mono Lake that could illuminate the early evolution of life
articles.content: Mono Lake, nestled in Californias Eastern Sierra Nevada, is a haven for unique life forms. Its iconic tufa formations and thriving populations of brine shrimp and alkali flies showcase an ecosystem a… [+7296 chars]
